text:
Red Badger | Full Stack Software Engineer | London | PERM | ONSITE | www.red-badger.com

Friendly independent consultancy based in Old Street, delivering complex enterprise web applications for big brands such as the Financial Times, Tesco, the BBC and many others. We also work on a number of social value projects including the Pride in London App.

TDD, pair programming, code reviews are part of our agile delivery process. We work in small X Functional teams of Delivery Leads, UX&D, Engineers and test.

You can find out more here: https://red-badger.com/jobs/software-engineer-consultant-nod... or email laura.hasting@red-badger.com
